comments.body:
It also seems that this package might be a "noarch" package
https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/knowledge_base.html?highlight=noarch#noarch-python

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@
build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

comments.body:
Please open an issue with upstream asking them to create a Manifest.in file with
```
include LICENSE.txt
```
in it.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@  license_family: MIT
  # PR upstream to package license https://github.com/marcospereirampj/python-keycloak/pull/68
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: "python-keycloak is a Python package providing access to the Keycloak API."
